mapper.sql: id id, username username, password password, email email, create_time createTime, update_time updateTime, creator creator, updater updater
mapper.select: SELECT u.username, u.PASSWORD, GROUP_CONCAT( r.NAME ORDER BY r.NAME SEPARATOR ', ' ) AS roles FROM user_info u INNER JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN role_info r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE username = #{username}
